before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5kqmp","text":"Human bone marrow is a rich source for CD34+ hematopoietic stem cells. CD34+ cells can be easily isolated and further processed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdlqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5d77e","text":"This protocol details the steps for isolating CD34+ cells from human bone marrow. The CD34+ cells isolated from this protocol can be used for generating humanized mice through reconstitution of immune cells via IV injection after bone marrow ablation. These cells can also be used for mixed lymphocyte reaction experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l3f1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0la0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q9ak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnenr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"772ds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":21,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ci18e","text":"Corresponding Authors","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"33it1","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":26,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6l5u5","text":"Mohsen Khosravi-Maharlooei","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"abls5","text":"Email: mkm2182@cumc.columbia.edu","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cvhkh","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7c8g","text":"Austin Chen","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5q5j5","text":"Email: ac4274@cumc.columbia.edu","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"76bql","text":"Tel: 425-283-6900","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ngvr","text":"Transfer the content of the collection bag into a sterile flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am2ac","text":"Add  BM Medium to the bag and rinse it thoroughly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmkud","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"9A83E460CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a6q7p","text":"Transfer the content of the collection bag into the sterile flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v4l3","text":"Layer  of the suspension over   of Histopaque","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9u7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"A4655770CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"AC9019D0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3leu2","text":"Centrifuge the tubes for 30 minutes   without brake at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"60vqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"B6A71BD0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2i0u9","text":"Collect the leukocyte ring in   Falcons and fill up with BM medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b71o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"C197B4F0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n5ea","text":"Wash once by centrifuging 6 minutes   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9egej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"CCC4BAD0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gmjb","text":"Resuspend the cells in MACS buffer and count (take  for FACS confirmation = PRE)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":46,"length":33},{"style":"italic","offset":46,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"nm2h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D82C7FC0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f6hn","text":"Wash down again and resuspend the pellet according to the protocol (130-046-702 MACS Human CD34+ kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":11}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"91918C40CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","url":"https://www.miltenyibiotec.com/US-en/products/cd34-microbead-kit-human.html#gref"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cv70k","text":"Add   of MACS buffer per 10^8 cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c4cse","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"E2F6F340CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"411j0","text":"Add   of FcR-B reagent per 10^8 cells, mix it and incubate in fridge for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ef82f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"EA3CACD0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d90qi","text":"Add  of CD34 beads per 10^8 cells to the suspension and mix and let it sit for 30 min (fridge)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57rek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"F2B4A4D0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g1c","text":"Fill up with   MACS buffer and strain through a blue strainer (40 uM)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ecn2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"FA9517C0CD1E11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bpai9","text":"Wash cells ( 6 min) and resuspend in MACS buffer 500 uL/200,000,000 cells. If you have more cells, increase volume accordingly. E.g 3 *10^9 cells = 7,5mL. Aliquot this volume to more than one (with   prerinsed) MACS column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":198,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjp4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"1F1E93F0CD1F11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"2CB14F30CD1F11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"q7f","text":"Wash with buffer   3 times and keep negative fraction (Take   for FCM = POST neg)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":55,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":18},{"style":"italic","offset":55,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":62,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ao74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"36532130CD1F11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3F7FEA40CD1F11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"82c5o","text":"Put the column out of the magnet and push out positive fraction with   Buffer and the plunger","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"988v3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"4839A630CD1F11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgvp6","text":"Collect the positive fractions. (Take   for FCM = Post pos)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":32,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7q9uu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"50030EB0CD1F11EBAF296DF1AA79EAAE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvn9v","text":"Process the cells as desired (injection in mouse or cryopreservation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5jbpm","text":"Check the puritiy with FACS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
